data.persona: I am the village priest. I cure people. I bring the light.
data.description:
You are in the Inside Church.
Small wooden crucifix decorations, wooden benches, small and dim windows, wooden walls, vases on small pillars, plants near church entrance
There's two windows, an empty coin bag, a stained glass, two Benchs, two vases, two plants, a wall, a pillar, and two Crucifixs here.
The clergy is here.

You are carrying nothing.
data.goal: steal empty coin bag from clergy

data.short_motivation: I want to use the empty coin bag
data.mid_motivation: I intend to fill the empty coin bag with valuables from the church today
data.long_motivation: I hope to sell the valuables and use the proceeds to support the villagers this winter
